title: ’Svenska språket, värderingar och sociala koder’? En innehållslig idé- och argumentationsanalys av kanondebatten 2006
abstract: Contrary to the predictions of the vascular depression hypothesis, altered encoding of rewards in late-life depression is dissociable from impaired contingency learning associated with poor executive control. Functional connectivity and behavioral analyses point to a disruption of ascending mesostriatocortical reward signals in late-life depression and a failure of cortical contingency encoding in elderly with poor executive control.
